full_summary:
================
### Paramount Building 25: Supply and Install of Pallet Racking

**Reference Number:** cb-463-79791366

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Project Overview**

The Fishery and Oceans Canada, on behalf of Small Craft Harbours (SCH), is seeking a contractor to supply and install a fully assembled engineered adjustable steel pallet rack at the new Building 25 in the Steveston Paramount Site, Richmond, BC. The rack must hold up to 1000 loaded pallets with 10 loaded pallets per bay over 6 aisles as per the architectural drawings.

**Project Requirements**

* The contractor must provide all necessary supervision, labor, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, quality control, health, and safety practices, and environmental protection services for the proper and complete execution of the work.
* The work consists of the supply, delivery, off-load, and complete installation of pallet racking and shelving systems as per architectural drawings and below Pallet Racking Requirements.

**Pallet Racking Requirements**

* The pallet racking system must be designed and engineered to comply with Canadian Standards Association (CSA) codes pertaining to steel.
* The pallet racking and shelving system must be laid out as detailed in the architectural drawings.
* The contractor shall be responsible for the installation of the pallet racking system, which must meet the requirements outlined in the specifications.

**Bid Information**

* Bid Title: Paramount Building 25: Supply and Install of Pallet Racking
* Bid Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Bid Closing Date: 2024-04-10 at 14:00 ET
* Location: Richmond, British Columbia, Canada

**Documents and Attachments**

* The bid documents can be downloaded from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/members/tender_packages](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/members/tender_packages)
* The specifiers, when requested, can be access from the same website.

### Important Dates

* Bid Closing Date: 2024-04-10 at 14:00 ET
* Contract Start Date: 2024-04-26
* Contract End Date: 2024-10-31

### Contracting Authority
Fisheries and Oceans Canada
200 Kent Street
Ottawa, ON K1A 0E6
Canada

### Bidder Inquiry

Any bidder inquiries must be submitted in writing to the contract authority
